title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: Big Data-Based Collaborative Learning Design: Student Performance Prediction and Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems

learning_goals: Learners can analyze peer learners' performance patterns with 80% accuracy using machine learning models.
Applying collaborative learning group formation strategies improves participation rates of low-achieving learners by over 30%.
Utilizing a real-time visualization dashboard compares group performance and suggests optimal restructuring strategies.
